channel.title: 377 Refractored Client
channel.description:
Hello, I'm looking for a 100% standared 377 Refractored client for Project Insanity base. I need it to be 100% 377 game frame, 100% 377 cache and 100% 377 graphics, animations, emotes, players, gfx.
Thanks.

item.title: 377 Refractored Client
item.dc:creator: @Skyro Arbe
item.description:
@Skyro wrote:

t4:

i believe it’s the update block that’s the culprit. see: headicon loading

What class? and where abouts should I look?

Read full topic

i believe it’s the update block that’s the culprit. see: headicon loading

never really looked into the pi updating and login. but i think you’re right.

item.title: 377 Refractored Client
item.dc:creator: @Skyro Arbe
item.description:
@Skyro wrote:

[quote=“Native^, post:4, topic:437644”][quote author=Skyro link=topic=540347.msg3957070#msg3957070 date=1332869292]

  1. pi is 317.
  2. 377 has the same game frame as 317.
  3. the most 317 load the 377 cache.
  4. i already gave you a link.

That client wasn’t refractored and doesn’t work with PI.
[/quote]
yes it was refectored. that was in fact one of the most refactored clients out here.
and pi has it’s login protocol fucked up. that’s why it doesn’t work.[/quote]
Well that’s handy… How can I fix it?

Read full topic
